thread.section_title: Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb service, excellent location
thread.title_full: Superb service, excellent location - Review of Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jane E
title: Superb service, excellent location
text:
I booked a room sight unseen for a recent business trip. When I called to confirm the reservation, I let the hotel staff know I would be arriving early and needed to change They said, "no problem." When I arrived, not only did they let me check in early to a fantastic room.
The breakfasts were great and start early. At night, the breakfast room becomes a quiet place to relax with newspapers and beer & wine. There are great restaurants in easy walking distance at Rue Cler.
